title: How Your Thoughts & Emotions Can Shape Your Life with Joe Dispenza
body:
In this interview, you will hear from author, lecturer and educator Dr. Joe Dispenza about how he went from the prime of his life, to in a single moment questioning whether he will ever be able to walk again. This injury was the one that changed his life forever and forged a new way of thinking, for the now world-leading expert in rewiring your brain to help you heal from the inside out.
Joe will walk you through the methodologies and the concept of emotional healing, how our thoughts and feelings are the vocabulary of the brain and how we can actively control these to mobilize our bodies natural healing capacity.
The power that made the body, should surely be able to heal the body. Right?

In this interview, you will learn:
- About the injury that changed Joe’s life
- Why he decided to heal himself without medical intervention
- How awareness is paying attention to vivid consciousness
- How Joe reconstructed his entire body using the power of the mind
- That nobody has the answers but you
- How healing needs to be done with sincerity and compassion
- How to open up the doors of possibly to answer the questions that aren’t available in a textbook or online
- The science of changing your mind
- The negative effect of the stress response
teaser: In this interview, you will hear from author, lecturer and educator Dr. Joe Dispenza about how he went from the prime of his life, to in a single moment questioning whether he will ever be able to walk again.

title: How I Overcame my Limiting Beliefs & Started My Own Business with Marie Forleo
body:
Join life coach, motivational speaker, author, founder of B-school, and web television host of Marie TV, Marie Forleo, as she unfolds her own experience of discovering and living out purpose.If you feel stuck, you’re unsure what your purpose in life is, or how to live it out, Marie helps to shed some light into that unknown so you can pave your own purposeful path.
There never has been, and there never will be another you. You do make a difference and the difference you make is up to you.

In this interview, you will learn:
- What life was like for her growing up and being the first of her family to go to college
- What happened when she decided to align herself with what she loved
- The keys to setting goals
- How to identify if you have any beliefs that are holding you back
- Powerful ways you can change those limiting beliefs
- The importance of having a connection to ourselves, other people, and Mother Nature
- How to discover if it is fear that is driving you, or intuition
- A few steps that you can take everyday to take your vision and make it happen
teaser: Join life coach, motivational speaker, author, founder of B-school, and web television host of Marie TV, Marie Forleo, as she unfolds her own experience of discovering and living out purpose.

title: How I Turned My Defeat Into a Success Story with Lewis Howes
body:
Join New York Times best selling author, life coach, entrepreneur, and keynote speaker, Lewis Howes for an interview about living out dreams, finding purpose, and creating true happiness in life.His journey of being forced to change his dream and find a new identity in his early 20’s led him to uncovering what actually matters in life and fueling it with gratitude and service.
You matter, therefore your dreams matter.

In this interview, you will learn:
- What one incident stripped away his dream and his identity, and how he moved forward
- His top ten people he was able to interview for his podcast
- The importance of living out your own meaning in life - not someone else’s
- What can be the fuel to get you through the challenges you face in life
- That big goals are achievable - fear is what tells you they aren’t
- Two aspects of life that affects happiness, and what to do to achieve it
- Routines he has put in place to set up his life to be a life of gratitude daily
teaser: Join New York Times best selling author, life coach, entrepreneur, and keynote speaker, Lewis Howes for an interview about living out dreams, finding purpose, and creating true happiness in life.

title: How Yoga, Meditation & Going Vegan Transformed my Life with Koya Webb
body:
Join internationally recognized yoga teacher, personal trainer, holistic health and wellness coach, author, and motivational speaker, Koya Webb, as she delves deep into the art of self-love. From a young girl growing up in country town Tennessee to fitness model in California, the lessons that she learned along her journey are inspiring and uplifting. It’s these lessons that push her to share her passion with the world. You never fail, unless you stop trying.

In this interview, you will learn:
- How growing up as an outcast, pushed her to be an overcomer
- The drastic changes she has made in her diet throughout her life
- How she started to embody mental, spiritual, and physical fitness
- The group support that helped keep her motivated and pushed her to even greater success
- Why self-love is the most important aspect of her life
- The best daily self care rituals
teaser: Join internationally recognized yoga teacher, personal trainer, holistic health and wellness coach, author, and motivational speaker, Koya Webb, as she delves deep into the art of self-love.

title: How Chris Beat Cancer Holistically with Chris Wark
body:
For this interview, join Chris Wark, author, speaker, and health coach, as he shares his secrets for beating cancer, naturally.From the debilitating fear brought on by a cancer diagnosis, to the negativity of those around him when he chose the unconventional approach for treatment, Chris explains the challenges he faced through his cancer journey, but also shares the hope on the other side.

In this interview, you’ll learn:
- The root cause of almost all chronic disease
- How finding harmony with nature was key to helping him heal
- The effect having a child shortly after being diagnosed had on his drive to survive
- The power of deciding what he wanted to live for had over his vitality
- What happened when he allowed his thoughts to become his reality
- His go-to foods for optimal cancer fighting nutrients
- The drastic amounts his faith grew throughout his whole journey
teaser: For this interview, join Chris Wark, author, speaker, and health coach, as he shares his secrets for beating cancer, naturally.

title: 50 Marathons, 50 States, 50 Days: Making the Impossible Possible with Dean Karnazes
body:
In this interview, American ultramarathon runner, New York Times bestselling author, and one of TIME magazine's top 100 most influential people in the world, Dean Karnazes, tells his story of leaving his job, pursuing his dreams, and living passionately. He inspires anyone who feels stuck in the rat race, runner or not, to push past the fears that could be keeping you from what you love.

In this interview, you will learn:
- The epiphany that led him to become an ultra marathon runner
- The craziest runs that he has done and the intense conditions he did them in
- His journey doing 50 marathons, in 50 states, in 50 days
- How over-convenience is leading to a huge decline in human potential
- How to uncover the fears that could be holding you back
- The diet he chooses to eat for sustainability & health
- The best thing to drink in order to get hydrated
teaser: In this interview, American ultramarathon runner, New York Times bestselling author, and one of TIME magazine's top 100 most influential people in the world, Dean Karnazes, tells his story of leaving his job, pursuing his dreams, and living passionately.

title: Going Plant-Based & Tapping Into Your Hidden Potential with Rich Roll
body:
Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive interview with author, ultra-endurance athlete and wellness advocate, Rich Roll as they take things back to the beginning and unpack Rich’s journey to wellness. From being an overweight, overworked 40-something to becoming an image of health and icon for human ability in the ultra endurance world, Rich's story contains those 'ah-hah' moments that that will trigger the resurgence of your own transformation.

You’ll also discover how food was the initial portal that brought Rich into a universe of personal growth and exploration. How changing the vibration of what he put into his body, opened up a sense of self care and a deeper connection with who he was and helped him to forge a pathway forward. Ultimately, leading him to discover the importance of mindset in relation to achieving true health.

In this interview, you will learn:
- About Rich’s Journey
- The wakeup call that made Rich change
- Rebuilding and repairing, what it involved
- How to positively look back on your story and learn from your actions
- How to find that willingness to change
- Why Rich chooses a 100% plant-based diet
- How to find and become the most authentic version of yourself
teaser: Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive interview with author, ultra-endurance athlete and wellness advocate, Rich Roll as they take things back to the beginning and unpack Rich’s journey to wellness.

title: Healing Trauma & Turning Fear into Faith with Gabrielle Bernstein
body:
Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive extended interview with author, motivational speaker and life coach, Gabrielle Bernstein as they discuss the process of healing trauma through spiritual connection and how you can turn your deep-seed fear into faith. You'll also gain the tools to realize your limiting beliefs through realigning your thoughts and connecting with the divine essence that is innate within us all.Open your mind, and discover the affinity.
In this interview, you will learn:
- Gabby's beginnings, and how she turned off her addiction to love, romance, food, drugs, and alcohol
- To realign your thoughts to connect more with the spiritual and the ultimate power of the universe
- To see the world beyond the physical sight and live a life beyond perception
- How to trigger your awakening
- The difference between fear and love
- Why we have become so fearful as people, and how to tell when our actions and decisions are coming from a place of fear.
- How to recondition our thought processes and our belief systems through prayer and meditation
teaser: Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive extended interview with author, motivational speaker and life coach, Gabrielle Bernstein as they discuss the process of healing trauma through spiritual connection and how you can turn your deep-seed fear into faith.

title: The Power of Visualization for Weight Loss and Body Transformation with Jon Gabriel
body:
Join Jon Gabriel in this exclusive extended interview, as he shares his knowledge on visualization and how he has personally harnessed the power of the practice to transform his body and lose excess weight which previously held him back. In the interview, Jon recounts the first time he experimented with visualization and how the art has followed him throughout his years and helped him consciously communicate with his body to catalyze desired change.'The mind and body connection is powerful, but how do you communicate with it?
In this interview you will learn:
- How Jon learned about the visualization practice
- How visualization is the language of symbols
- How to communicate consciously with the body and take control of the steering wheel
- Anecdotes of highly successful people who have used the practice
- How to set the dials of your life to help you achieve all you’ve ever wanted'
- Meditation and visualization, is there a difference?
- Increasing your intuition through ritual practice
teaser: Join Jon Gabriel in this exclusive extended interview, as he shares his knowledge on visualization and how he has personally harnessed the power of the practice to transform his body and lose excess weight which previously held him back.

title: How to Prevent & Reverse Autoimmune Disease with Josh Axe
body:
Join certified doctor of natural medicine and clinical nutritionist, Dr. Josh Axe, as he goes into the complexities of the gut lining and factors that lead to autoimmune disease. Drawing from his own experiences, Dr. Axe unpacks food as medicine, having the power to heal, from chronic diseases to cancer.Everything you eat has the power to heal or to harm, but you have the power to choose.

In this interview, you will learn:
- The catalyst that hit close to home but sent him into studying natural medicine
- The biggest autoimmune diseases that are linked to gut issues
- Some of the main factors that lead to leaky gut and gut issues
- The role emotional stress has on damaging the microbiome
- The types of wheat that can actually be good for you
- His top recommendations for what people should be eating and what is the ultimate diet
- The endless positive effects of using essential oil
- The physical effects of emotions on specific parts of the body
- Spiritual triathlons as the best way to start the day
teaser: Join certified doctor of natural medicine and clinical nutritionist, Dr. Josh Axe, as he goes into the complexities of the gut lining and factors that lead to autoimmune disease.

title: Using Breathwork to Make You Stronger & Calmer with Wim Hof
body:
Join Wim Hof, or more commonly known as the "Ice Man" in this exclusive extended interview as he shares his knowledge and journey on how breathwork and cold therapy has made him mentally and physically strong. You'll also learn about the becoming of his methods and how you too can apply his concepts to help you become stronger and calmer.
Inspiring and insightful, this interview will help you comprehend the incredible power of harnessing your own body's potential.

In this interview, you'll learn:
- About Wim's upbringing and what led him to discover cold therapy and breathe work
- How society and science rejected Wim's methods and experiences
- The physiological rationale behind the concept of breathing
- How to become an alchemist of your own body
- To make your immune system work for you
- The tools to control your mood
- How to consciously tap into the depth, discover what endangers your immune system which attacks your functionality
Disclaimer: Always do the breathing exercise in a safe environment (e.g. sitting on a couch/floor) and unforced. Never practice it before or during diving, driving, swimming, taking a bath, or any other environment/place where it might be dangerous to faint. The breathing exercise has a profound effect and should be practiced in the way it is explained.
teaser: Join Wim Hof, or more commonly known as the "Ice Man" in this exclusive extended interview as he shares his knowledge and journey on how breathwork and cold therapy has made him mentally and physically strong.

title: Hormones, Stress, Weight Loss & the Art of Managing It All with Libby Weaver
body:
Join one of Australasia's leading nutritional biochemists, author, and speaker Dr. Libby Weaver, as she shares her knowledge of stress and the detrimental effects it can have on the body. Through her three pillar approach - biochemical, nutritional, & emotional - she explains how she leads people to healthy habits, in both their diets as well as their thought patterns.
She also goes deep into limiting beliefs and when and how they take root. These beliefs can go unnoticed but can be visible in the ways they are actually holding you back. Her solution?? Discovering who you really are and prepare to be in awe of yourself.

In this interview, you will learn:
- What kickstarted her passion for health and wellness
- The key question she asks her patients to find out their relationship with food and health
- The intricate consequences of being nutritionally deficient
- The way the body communicates to us and give us feedback to what we are fuelling it with
- Pressure and urgency as a perception that leads us to a stressful lifestyle - detrimental for our health
- The lifestyle stressors that many people they are unaware they live in because they are ‘normal’
- The real currency of health and how to get it
- Joy as medicine and the support it can be to your overall wellness
- Techniques to reduce stress or fear
- The science behind your beliefs creating your experience
teaser: Join one of Australasia's leading nutritional biochemists, author, and speaker Dr. Libby Weaver, as she shares her knowledge of stress and the detrimental effects it can have on the body.

title: What I Learnt Holding My Breath for 22 Minutes with Stig Severinsen
body:
Join Guinness World Record holder and 4x world free diving champion Stig Severinsen, as he dives deep into the unlimited power of the breath. As a biologist, he gives the science behind the countless benefits of breathwork as well as the physiological capabilities people can have over their body when they tap into this understanding.Every breath you take is living life to the fullest.

In this interview, you will learn:
- His countless achievements and the impact they have on his daily health
- The feelings he experienced holding his breath for a world record 22 minutes
- How breathing correctly can lead to better performance, healing, & stress reduction
- How to tap into the true potential of humanity through breathwork
- The negative effects of not being aware of the breath
- The link between breathwork and visualisation and the way it ignites the power of possibility
- Through the breath, people are able to connect in with the heart and change the heart rate
- How easy it is to incorporate breath work into your daily routine
Disclaimer: Always do the breathing exercise in a safe environment (e.g. sitting on a couch/floor) and unforced. Never practice it before or during diving, driving, swimming, taking a bath, or any other environment/place where it might be dangerous to faint. The breathing exercise has a profound effect and should be practiced in the way it is explained.
teaser: Join Guinness World Record holder and 4x world free diving champion Stig Severinsen, as he dives deep into the unlimited power of the breath.

title: How to Set Yourself Free From Pain & Misery with Sean Stephenson
body:
Join Sean Stephenson, therapist, self-help best-selling author, and motivational speaker, as he takes us on his journey of setting himself free from pain and misery through the power of choice. Born with a rare bone disorder that caused his bones to become very fragile and stunted his growth, he faced countless challenges, however, he pushed through, pursuing a life of quality. His message is inspiring, encouraging each of us to change our mindset for a life of abundance, a life of joy, and recognizing all of the good.

In this interview, you will learn:
- The one question that has set him up for life and the success he has had to this day
- We all have control over what we make things mean
- Insecurities are one of the greatest thieves of the human value
- How to manage your insecurities when there is no cure
- The power we all have to determine the labels that are put on us
- When you decided to be unrealistic, you an create incredible opportunities
teaser: Join Sean Stephenson, therapist, self-help best-selling author, and motivational speaker, as he takes us on his journey of setting himself free from pain and misery through the power of choice.

title: What Is a Healthy Diet with Mark Hyman
body:
It’s time to take back our health, starting with our food. In this interview, you will learn from the best. Dr. Mark Hyman believes that we all deserve a life of vitality and that we have the potential to create it for ourselves. That’s why he is dedicated to tackling the root causes of chronic disease by harnessing the power of Functional Medicine to transform healthcare.

In this interview, you will learn:
- How the food industry, marketing and our choices has such a profound effect on our health
- The frightening facts about sports drinks and the proposal of the sugar tax
- The truth about fat and different types to include and avoid
- The importance of the gut microbiome and foods to eat for a healthy microbiome
- Effects of gluten, coeliac disease and gluten sensitivities and how to avoid them
- Foods to eat, and foods to avoid for optimal health
- The role of stress, the power of the mind and mind body techniques
- The importance of living a life of purpose and passion and how Mark got to where he is
teaser: It’s time to take back our health, starting with our food. In this interview, you will learn from the best. Dr. Mark Hyman believes that we all deserve a life of vitality and that we have the potential to create it for ourselves.

title: How to Find Your Gift & Live a Meaningful Life with Philip Mckernan
body:
Join inspirational speaker, author, and filmmaker, Philip McKernan, through his journey of finding his gift and his purpose in life.He explains how easy it is today to take on the goals of others, thinking it is what we are meant to do, and then finding dissatisfaction when they are reached, only to then cling to a new goal, that will lead down the same path. For him, the breakthrough came when he realized he needed to value himself and believe in who he is as a person before any external achievement would matter.

In this interview, you will learn:
- What sparked his journey to becoming a writing and motivational speaker, even as someone who struggled with dyslexia
- The trap of finding identity in what we do instead of who we are
- The question he asks people in order to unlock where misleading goals have come from in their life
- Why finding out what motivates you is key to finding your purpose
teaser: Join inspirational speaker, author, and filmmaker, Philip McKernan, through his journey of finding his gift and his purpose in life.

title: How Gluten Affects Your Mood, Skin & Gut with Tom O'Bryan
body:
Join world-renowned expert in the field of gluten-related disorders, non-celiac gluten sensitivity, & celiac disease, Dr. Tom O’Bryan as he dives deep into gluten and the numerous effects it has on the body. With such a high percentage of people claiming to be gluten-intolerant, we could ask if it is just a fad, after all, our ancestors ate so much wheat! Dr. Tom O’Bryan helps us navigate what seems to be a trend and explains the science behind it. Plus, he unpacks the myriad of symptoms that point to a gluten intolerance.

In this interview, you will learn:
- How infertility led him to a deep study of autoimmune conditions
- The endless list of symptoms that point to a sensitivity to wheat
- The mechanisms of gut permeability and the link it has to autoimmune conditions and health in general
- What happens to everyone when they eat wheat - celiac or not
- How wheat went from being the optimal crop, to the danger that it is today
- The difference between coeliac disease and gluten-sensitivity
- Dr. Tom O’Bryan’s tips for creating a healthy environment in the gut
teaser: Join world-renowned expert in the field of gluten-related disorders, non-celiac gluten sensitivity, & celiac disease, Dr. Tom O’Bryan as he dives deep into gluten and the numerous effects it has on the body.

title: How to Live a Longer, Happier & More Purposeful Life with John Robbins
body:
Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive interview as he chats with John Robbins, author of Diet For A New America and co-founder of The Food Revolution Network with his son Ocean Robbins.
The pair discuss how John has become a trailblazer in the wellness industry, how he turned away from his destined path of running his family’s multi-million dollar business and how he maintained his integrity to live a longer, happier and a more purposeful life.
In this interview, you will learn:
- How John became a Trailblazer in the health in wellness industry
- About John’s upbringing and what lead him to discover a path of wellness
- How he came to terms with walking away from the life his parents pathed for him
- The emotional journey of turning away from financial security
- How to live in respect of yourself and others
- How John closed the loop with his father
- The historical disconnect of the American Diet
teaser: Join James Colquhoun in this exclusive interview as he chats with John Robbins on how he turned away from his destined path of running his family’s multi-million dollar business and how he maintained his integrity to live a longer, happier and a more purposeful life.

title: The Power of Belief to Transform Your Life & Health with Bruce Lipton
body:
In this interview, you’ll be hearing from Stem Cell Biologist and Author, Dr Bruce Lipton as he discusses the evolution of how we perceive genetics, the importance of early childhood thinking and how to condition the subconscious mind.
Bruce will talk in depth about the relationship between, biology, physics and the mechanics of the mind through powerful metaphors that will push you towards regaining your own innate power to transform your life and your health. From the inside out.
Be sure to get your pen and paper ready, this interview is packed with detailed and invaluable information.

In this interview, you will learn:
- Bruce’s beginnings as a conventional science teacher
- The evolution of science over the last 50 years
- How the environment controls your genetics
- How you’re not a victim of your hereditary
- The power of your biology
- The culture medium of emotions and their effect on your health
- How the change of your thoughts changes the chemistry of your body
- Growth and protection can’t happen at the same time
- About how illness today is 99% based on your current health and your stress levels
- How belief is a potent element in your wellbeing
teaser: In this interview, you’ll be hearing from Stem Cell Biologist and Author, Dr Bruce Lipton as he discusses the evolution of how we perceive genetics, the importance of early childhood thinking and how to condition the subconscious mind.

title: How to Break Free From the Culturescape & Live an Epic Life with Vishen Lakhiani
body:
In this interview, we’ll be hearing from Vishen Lakhiani, entrepreneur, education activist, and author of the international bestseller, The Code of the Extraordinary Mind.Vishen discusses the concept of culturescape and how it is inextricably intertwined with our happiness. You’ll learn the importance of breaking free from societal holds and how to live an epic and fulfilling life. You’ll also learn about Vishen’s journey, how he got where he is today and how he credits meditation as the humbling and centering practice that fuels his drive to see the world in a different way and define his life based on his happiness.
“Happiness is not a byproduct of something, it’s a state of mind and the rocket fuel for your goals.”

In this interview, you will learn:
- What is a culturescape
- Why Vishen credits meditation for his success and happiness
- The evolution of fear
- How to question the norms and rules of society
- How to conform goals for ourselves rather than society
- Why Happiness is Vishen's number 1 priority
- The "If Then" theory
- How to move from a life of fear to a life of love
teaser: In this interview, we’ll be hearing from Vishen Lakhiani, entrepreneur, education activist, and author of the international bestseller, The Code of the Extraordinary Mind.

title: How to Overcome Fear and Self-Sabotage with Ocean Ramsey
body:
Ocean’s story is uniquely her own - a competitive freediver turned shark conservationist, you may be thinking 'how can I relate? When it comes to overcoming fear and self-sabotage, whatever that may look like, the strategies to working through it are much the same; be it shark or public speaking. In this interview, Ocean will share a little bit about herself, her work, why she’s an advocate for shark conservation, and how she works through the challenges she faces along the way.

In this interview, you will learn:
- About why she is so passionate about the ocean and shark conservation
- How we all rely on the health of the ocean
- The detriment of our single use plastic lifestyle
- Self discipline and how to make it instinctively natural
- How to turn fear to fascination
- How do you work through fear
- How to take not and learn from others experiences and expertise
- How to consciously program yourself
- How do you take yourself and work to the next level
- The importance of adapting to challenges
teaser: In this interview, Ocean will share a little bit about herself, her work, why she’s an advocate for shark conservation, and how she works through the challenges she faces along the way.

title: Living a Life That Matters with Intention & Purpose with Brendon Burchard
body:
Join Brendon Burchard, #1 New York Times bestselling author, and internationally renowned high-performance coach. After spending years studying psychology and leadership, Brendon is now one of the world’s leading high-performance coaches, speakers, and best-selling authors. He is also one of the most influential leaders in the field of personal growth.In this interview, you will learn:
- Brendan's near death experience and turning point in his life
- How to live each day intentionally through asking important questions
- What could be holding you back from reaching your ultimate potential?
- How to become aware of fear and break through mental barriers
- The important practice of visualization and self talk
teaser: Join Brendon Burchard, #1 New York Times bestselling author, and internationally renowned high-performance coach.

title: Feeding You Lies: Secrets of the Food Industry with Vani Hari
body:
With Indian heritage, Vani’s parents were adamant that while their children were growing up, they didn’t feel different to the other American kids. This meant allowing them to eat whatever they wanted, which usually meant fast and predominantly packaged foods. Eventually, Vani felt something was wrong and at the young age of 18, she was taking 8 different types of prescription medications at once.
In this interview, you will hear why Vani began to consider the food she ate and their contribution to her health. After she turned her diet and ultimately her health around, her recovery was the catalyst to becoming an activist, uncovering the secrets of the food industry.
You’ll hear about Vani’s journey, shocking tales of what she has uncovered, and how and why she continues to press forward to rally for a food industry that is transparent.

In this interview, you will learn:
- Where Vani’s journey began
- How she got the ‘Food Police’ nickname
- How she confronted Kraft and artificial coloring.
- How to better understand food labels
teaser: In this interview, you will hear why Vani began to consider the food she ate and their contribution to her health.

title: From Broken Brain to World Leader in Learning with Jim Kwik
body:
Witness the incredible story of world leader in accelerated learning, Jim Kwik, who at a young age experienced an injury that would change his life forever. After this pivotal incident, Jim was left with learning difficulties and was labeled ‘The Boy with the broken brain’. His life was shrouded with unattainable milestones that everyone else was reaching until he figured out a different way to learn.
In this interview, you will hear from Jim about his journey, his struggles and how he broke down the barriers within himself that were holding him back from who he wanted to be.

In this interview, you will learn:
- Jim’s journey
- The injury that changed his life
- How knowledge is power & learning is your superpower
- How to uncover where your blocks are
- How to know yourself and be yourself
- How to set goals from a place of passion rather than fear of not being enough
teaser: In this interview, you'll hear from world leader in accelerated learning, Jim Kwik, all about his journey, his struggles, and how he broke down the barriers within himself that were holding him back from who he wanted to be.

title: Is Modern Wheat Making You Sick? With William Davis
body:
The food that has dominated the base of our food pyramid for the last century, and has been the core of many cultures' diets throughout history, isn’t what it used to be.
In this interview, you'll hear from cardiologist and bestselling author William Davis, about his investigation into the link between the modern wheat we consume today and chronic illnesses, specifically diseases of the heart.
William will briefly touch on the history of the grain and how we arrived where we are today, with this unrecognizable food source that’s causing more disruption than good.

In this interview, you will learn:
- William’s career and curiosity of the evolution of wheat
- The incorrect correlation between heart disease and cholesterol
- What small LDL cholesterol particles are
- Why modern wheat is not what it used to be
- The specific components of wheat that are detrimental to our health
- Why the food pyramid has not changed
- If cutting out gluten and grains improve your performance
teaser: In this interview, you'll hear from cardiologist and bestselling author William Davis, about his investigation into the link between the modern wheat we consume today and chronic illnesses, specifically diseases of the heart.

title: Becoming World No. 1 with Novak Djokovic
body:
When Novak Djokovic won the epic Men’s Singles Final over Roger Federer in 2019, he extended his reign as the world’s Number One men’s tennis player. Many fans know his story of growing up in war-torn Serbia and his life-long ambition to be a tennis champion.  But few fans know of how he transformed himself through diet and nutrition, along with yoga and mindful meditation, to achieve the stamina that ultimately allowed him to collect 20 Tennis Grand Slam titles.

This extended interview was filmed for FMTV's series “Transcendence,” which Gaia will offer in full in the upcoming months.
teaser: From childhood in war-torn Serbia to 5 Wimbledon championships, Novak Djokovic transformed his life by changing his diet.

title: How to Rewild Yourself with Daniel Vitalis
body:
When we hear the word domestication, we immediately think of livestock or our furry companions. But how would you respond if it was said that humans are as equally domesticated? Would you agree?      

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, modern-day hunter-gatherer Daniel Vitalis lays out the timeline explaining how we have inadvertently built a trajectory for life so controlled by social constructs and reliance on systems that we have no idea what true freedom feels like.
teaser: When we hear the word domestication, we immediately think of livestock or our furry companions. But how would you respond if it was said that humans are as equally domesticated?

title: How to Reclaim Your Human Spirit with Douglas Rushkoff
body:
It’s commonly said that the digital revolution has left us more connected than ever before and as equally disconnected. We have mistaken operating systems for reality and are losing grip of living authentic lives.

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Douglas Rushkoff, author and media theorist, delves into who we have become as a species in the modern era based on our colonialist past and industrialism. Douglas also speaks on how it has fed into our anxieties and lack of self-worth, and what we can do about it.
teaser: It’s commonly said that the digital revolution has left us more connected than ever before and as equally disconnected.

title: Dreaming Big & Making Your Goals a Reality with Kristina Karlsson
body:
What would you do if you couldn’t fail? It’s the question that drives Kristina Karlsson, the dreamer behind Swedish-design stationery company Kikki K, that went from an idea at 3 a.m. to her opening 100 stores across the globe. 

In this extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Kristina explores the relationship between values, dreams, and purpose, and how one of her greatest visions has helped to give back to schools in Zimbabwe. She balances her self doubt with big dreams and is on a mission to inspire one million others to do the same.
teaser: What would you do if you couldn’t fail? It’s the question that drives Kristina Karlsson, the dreamer behind Swedish-design stationery company Kikki K, that went from an idea at 3 a.m. to her opening 100 stores across the globe.

title: How to Redefine Your Life & Success with Vishen Lakhiani
body:
Vishen Lakhiani is on a mission to create a conscious world. In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Vishen explores the failures of our current education system and how parenting is a lesson in self. 

With stories of conscious uncoupling, learning from suffering, forming beliefs, and unifying as a collective humanity, eye-opening and transformational changes await you.
teaser: Vishen Lakhiani is on a mission to create a conscious world, and here Vishen explores the failures of our current education system and how parenting is a lesson in self.

title: Discovering Inner Peace Through Connection with Sadhvi Bhagawatiji
body:
When Sadhvi Bhagawatiji walked away from her Ph.D. in psychology, she wasn’t searching for anything. Destiny found her. She has spent the last 23 years living in India, exploring service, self, and spirituality. 

In this delightful extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Sadhvi shares her profound insights on the baggage that surrounds finding purpose and meaning in life, how we can find that purpose in the most surprising places, and how connection and oneness can help to heal the world. 

Through the retelling of her story and own experiences, this author and spiritual leader guides you on a journey of discovering the depth and truth of who you were born to be.
teaser: When Sadhvi Bhagawatiji walked away from her Ph.D. in psychology, she wasn’t searching for anything. Destiny found her. She has spent the last 23 years living in India, exploring service, self, and spirituality.

title: How to Use Forgiveness & Compassion to Heal with Ira Israel
body:
What are the stories that you tell yourself?  The ones that you are convinced could be true and shape the way you live your life? Language creates reality, and you have a choice to live in the past or cultivate a brighter future. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Ira Israel, author, psychotherapist, and counselor, draws from personal and professional experiences to share with you the effectiveness and importance of applying tools to heal from physical and emotional trauma and to discover a new “way of being” in order to thrive mentally and emotionally in your relationships, career, and creative expression.
teaser: What are the stories that you tell yourself? The ones that you are convinced could be true and shape the way you live your life? Language creates reality, and you have a choice to live in the past or cultivate a brighter future.

title: Aligning with Your Truth with Philip McKernan
body:
Most of us are on a quest to achieve a deeper sense of peace, happiness, and connection, but instead of looking internally, we’re seeking validation from external inputs, which has led us to an ‘epidemic’ of dissatisfaction and isolation. Our self-worth ultimately being driven by society’s digital framework and our obsession with presenting success. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, motivational speaker and author Philip McKernan explores the facets of exposing our vulnerabilities to help us heal, and subsequently connect to, excavate, and bring to the surface the light within us.
teaser: Most of us are on a quest to achieve a deeper sense of peace, happiness, and connection, but instead of looking internally, we’re seeking validation from external inputs, which has led us to an “epidemic” of dissatisfaction and isolation.

title: Finding Your Path to Healing & Bliss with Artie Wu
body:
What if you were told that your wound is the source of your greatest gift? That your wound basically throws a penny into the deep end of a pool, pushing you to dive down into the depths to retrieve it, and along the way discovering your true bliss. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Artie Wu, author, emotional healer, and avid meditator, shares his tools for transformation, the patterns he has uncovered through his work, and how to realign our lives to be congruent with the things that make us happy.
teaser: What if you were told that your wound is the source of your greatest gift? That your wound basically throws a penny into the deep end of a pool, pushing you to dive down into the depths to retrieve it.

title: Change Your Beliefs, Change Your Life with Shelly Lefkoe
body:
If we understood that every moment and interaction was setting our child up with beliefs in this world, what would we do differently? And how would we remove meaning  from the moment? 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, parenting expert Shelly Lefkoe shares insight into how limiting beliefs are formed and how we can begin to dismantle them. Through her experiences of working with people in incarceration and anecdotes of her own motherhood, Shelly shares her takes on how you can raise children to be their authentic selves and why transforming the way we parent will change the world.
teaser: If we understood that every moment and interaction was setting our child up with beliefs in this world, what would we do differently? And how would we remove meaning  from the moment?

title: Finding, Keeping & Being Love with Arielle Ford
body:
Arielle Ford never imagined herself becoming an expert on love, but after waking up in her 40s and manifesting the soulmate of her dreams, she was inspired to help others do the same. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, the author dives deeper into the idea of Wabi-Sabi love, why you should be acting as your partner’s defense attorney, and how adrenaline may be what you need to explore your sex life. 

For those still searching, you will explore the idea of “feathering the nest” and embracing a new shift in dating, all while coming from a place of love and acceptance for yourself and those around you.
teaser: Arielle Ford never imagined herself becoming an expert on love, but after waking up in her 40s and manifesting the soulmate of her dreams, she was inspired to help others do the same.

title: How to Educate Yourself for the Future with Sir Ken Robinson
body:
Sir Ken Robinson passed away in August 2020 after a long career as an influential thinker and writer.

How has your education shaped who you are? Was the system attentive to your needs, or was your individuality cast to the side and ignored? 
In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, the ever-insightful Sir Ken Robinson shares his thought-provoking tales and theories on the state of our global education system. The current systems of mass public education, initiated by governments and carrying the interests of the industrial revolution, are just one way that we standardize and encourage conformity from a young age. 

Through a heartwarming story about one of the world’s greatest dancers who was almost diagnosed with a learning difficulty, you’ll understand the importance of cultivating creativity and acknowledging multiple types of intelligence.
teaser: How has your education shaped who you are? Was the system attentive to your needs, or was your individuality cast to the side and ignored?

title: How to Use Meditation & Life Visioning for Awakening with Michael Beckwith
body:
We are living in a high-tech, low-touch society that’s driven by attainment and consumerism. We have reached a point of spiritual bankruptcy, that has left us intentionless in our actions, deficit of attention, and ultimately unhappy. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Reverend Michael Beckworth, founder of the Agape Spiritual Center imparts his wisdom on how we can raise our vibrational frequency and return to a state of contentment. A place where we radiate, shine, give, and share our unique and innate gifts with the world.
teaser: We are living in a high-tech, low-touch society that’s driven by attainment and consumerism. We have reached a point of spiritual bankruptcy, that has left us intentionless in our actions, deficit of attention, and ultimately unhappy.

title: The Art of Self Love for Inner Happiness with Kim Morrison
body:
Kim Morrison is, among many things, an athlete, aromatherapist, author, and a mother. Her journey to self-love and acceptance hasn’t been without challenge, but that’s the gift that makes her unique. 

In this special extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Kim shares her secrets to resilience, realization, and why it’s okay to be making mistakes and forever learning. Kim shares her seven steps of self-love that she uses with her family at home, alongside an abundant knowledge of essential oils and how to use them in everyday life.
teaser: Kim Morrison is, among many things, an athlete, aromatherapist, author, and a mother. Her journey to self-love and acceptance hasn’t been without challenge, but that’s the gift that makes her unique.

title: How to Heal Emotional Trauma Using EFT with Dawson Church
body:
Have you always wanted to develop a deeper understanding of how past traumatic experiences affect your inner being? Why does it manifest in your body in a certain way? What steps can you take to heal? 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Dawson Church, PhD, takes the opportunity to explore the impact of thoughts and beliefs on the brain. Through his life-long research into gene expression, he shares exactly how our mindset and stress-response can hardwire the brain and create our “reality,” and the tools we can use to rewrite that reality.
teaser: Have you always wanted to develop a deeper understanding of how past traumatic experiences affect your inner being? Why does it manifest in your body in a certain way? What steps can you take to heal?

title: Free Yourself from Pain and Trapped Emotions with Bradley Nelson
body: Bradley Nelson is one of the world's foremost experts in the emerging fields of Bioenergetic Medicine and Energy Psychology. In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, he explores how pain and illness can often be a sign of emotional baggage, whether it's physical, emotional, or mental pain. Explore how you can re-discover this experience and begin to re-write your story anew.
teaser: Bradley Nelson is one of the world's foremost experts in the emerging fields of Bioenergetic Medicine and Energy Psychology. Explore how you can re-discover this experience and begin to re-write your story anew.

title: The Miraculous Power of Tapping with Nick Ortner
body:
What if you could immediately alleviate pain, stress and other health ailments, using a simple, proven technique accessible to you at any time? In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, The Tapping Solution founder Nick Ortner explores the widespread benefits of the simple practice of tapping. 

Hear the story of a woman who came to forgive her son’s killer, understand how beliefs are formed and how to dismantle them, and learn how you can begin to heal through tapping, today.
teaser: What if you could immediately alleviate pain, stress and other health ailments, using a simple, proven technique accessible to you at any time? Learn how you can begin to heal through tapping.

title: A Journey to Self-Acceptance & Healing with Jennifer Partridge
body:
The way trauma expresses itself in our lives can come in many shapes and forms, more often than not it leaves us unable to interact and cope with everyday tasks. Tapping expert Jennifer Partridge knows all too well the lifelong cost of built-up trauma and its impact on how we function in society. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Jennifer shares her personal story, the burden of trauma in her life, and how she used tapping to release and address the inner agony from past experiences that held her back from finding peace in life.
teaser: The way trauma expresses itself in our lives can come in many shapes and forms, more often than not it leaves us unable to interact and cope with everyday tasks. Tapping expert Jennifer Partridge knows all too well the lifelong cost of built-up trauma and its impact on how we function in society.

title: Mother Nature’s Smart Drugs & How to Use Them with Dave Asprey
body:
Dave Asprey is a computer ‘hacker’ turned biohacker, a realm he came to discover while on his own journey to weight loss and healing. In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, the author and founder of Bulletproof sits down with filmmaker James Colquhoun to dive deeper into the plant-based compounds that are impacting our health. 

Whether it’s regenerative agriculture or mold toxins in your coffee, prepare to challenge your mind about plant medicine and discover a new way of being.
teaser: Dave Asprey is a computer “hacker” turned biohacker, a realm he came to discover while on his own journey to weight loss and healing. Prepare to challenge your mind about plant medicine and discover a new way of being.

title: Using Herbs, Mushrooms, & Adaptogens to Thrive with Nick Polizzi
body:
Nick Polizzi, author and producer of The Sacred Science, shares a classic tale of a conventional American upbringing on a Standard American Diet (SAD) that propelled him towards a lengthy battle with chronic migraines. His tireless hunt for a successful antidote left him uncertain there was a cure until he took matters into his own hands. 

In this extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Nick shares how he eliminated his headaches with the removal of one herb from his diet and how his recovery led him down a pathway to discovering the wonders of plant medicine for the mind and the body.
teaser: Nick Polizzi, author and producer of The Sacred Science, shares a classic tale of a conventional American upbringing on a Standard American Diet (SAD) that propelled him towards a lengthy battle with chronic migraines.

title: Finding Your Path to Greatness with Mike Sherbakov
body:
Our quality of life depends on the quality of the questions we ask ourselves. In this extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Mike Sherbakov, a former marine, turned conscious entrepreneur, reveals the questions he asked himself to break free from the glass ceiling of limitations that we impose on ourselves. 

He shares his combined knowledge of spirituality, psychology, and kinesiology to redefine capitalism through the creation of energetically balanced conscious companies that serve a greater purpose.
teaser: Our quality of life depends on the quality of the questions we ask ourselves. Mike Sherbakov, a former marine, turned conscious entrepreneur, reveals the questions he asked himself to break free from the glass ceiling of limitations that we impose on ourselves.

title: How to Bounce Back When Life Knocks You Down with Sonia Ricotti
body:
What does it take to help you bounce back? Does it get harder each time, or does the resilience make you stronger? Sonia Ricotti has experienced the worst of it. A six-figure debt, a tough break-up with an alcoholic partner, foreclosure on her home, and a medical emergency. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, Sonia shares her story of finding light and meaning through adversity and how she began to find her way through it all. Begin to unpack the story you keep telling yourself and start to rewrite it.
teaser: What does it take to help you bounce back? Does it get harder each time, or does the resilience make you stronger? Sonia Ricotti has experienced the worst of it.

title: Overcoming Adversity Through Mindset with Turia Pitt
body:
Turia Pitt is a superhero who has overcome challenges far tougher than any of us could imagine. At age 24, while competing in an ultramarathon in the Australian outback, an already grueling task, she was caught in a wildfire. With no escape, she faced burns on 65% of her body. 

In this exclusive extended interview from Transcendence Season 2, the mining engineer, athlete, motivational speaker, author, and mother, talks about how she was faced with two choices when she woke up in hospital after the fires — but really there was only one way forward. Through her incredible experiences and her endless achievements, Turia shares how she overcame adversity through the power of her mind.
teaser: Turia Pitt is a superhero who has overcome challenges far tougher than any of us could imagine. At age 24, while competing in an ultramarathon in the Australian outback, she was caught in a wildfire and faced burns on 65% of her body.
